creator: michael.eriksson@bauer-partner.de
text:
In the classloader HOW-TO there are several references to 
$CATALINA_HOME/shared/...
According to the code $CATALINA_BASE/shared/... is used.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in CVS will be included in the next release of TC4. Also fixed in TC5.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 27710 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
